name: Healthy Eater
description:
Please notice this is just my first game that makes with C# and releases in such a big platform, so do NOT expect this is a fantastic game.

"Healthy Eater" is a game about eating healthy.

The only goal you have to complete in this game is just keep eating healthy food
to let you have enough energy to survive. But you will not win in this game.
As this is just a game for you to try to get a higher mark each time or compare it to others.

Currently supported languages of this game by default:

  1. English (default)
  2. Chinese (Traditional) (chinese_traditional)
  3. Chiese (Simplified) (chiese_simplified)

    4. Currently features of this game:

    1. Configurable difficulty
    2. Configurable language files
    3. Moddable contents
    4. Nothing special actually and looks childish

    Planned features of this game:

    1. Randomized energy and unhealthy values per food
    2. Show the name of the foods in-game
    3. More content in default food pack
    4. Better background and textures
    5. Sound or BGM
    6. Bug fixing

    Rules of this game:

    1. Eat some healthy food when you are out of energy.
    2. Try to avoid unhealthy food as it will add your unhealthy bar.
    3. Try not to eat any food when you are full of energy as it will add your unhealthy bar.
    4. When your energy bar is empty or your unhealthy bar is full, you lose.

    The target range of players: Children who ages are similar or equals to a normal primary school student


    System requirements: Operating system:Windows 7 or higher CPU:Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-4170 or better RAM:1GB or higher storage:10MB or higher

    Please report to me if you found any bug(s) in this game!

    Patreon link: not available now.


    Have fun!
